item.title: Wyld Style (Working Title)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Trentdaddy)
item.dc:creator: Trentdaddy
item.content:encoded:
Concept: A Wild-West style duel Mod and/or mute.
UT Version: I prefer UT99, but it might be a great idea for all if one hasn't been made for them.

Two players start out with their backs to each other (can this be forced?). They are required to walk 10 paces foward (or any amount of paces set by the server in options, maybe use seconds instead) before they can turn around and shoot, or run or do whatever.

Now let's say there are mutliple players (hopefully even amounts). Every set of...

Wyld Style (Working Title)

item.title: Quadshotgun
item.author: invalid@example.com (Postal)
item.dc:creator: Postal
item.content:encoded: I would love to see something bring back the quadshotgun. Make a nice spiffy new model. I personaly loved unloading 4 shotshells in someones face.

item.title: [Kang] Kangus's Stuff in Progress
item.author: invalid@example.com (Kangus)
item.dc:creator: Kangus
item.content:encoded:
New thread of stuff I'm working on and ideas I have.

[BETA] Exploding Barrels mutator: This one's as good as done. It places respawning exploding barrels at random points around the map. You can control how many barrels there are, as well as how quickly they respawn. You can push the barrels around the map to set up better traps. Eventually I will add multiple types of barrels, such as sludge and cargo barrels.

[35%]...

[Kang] Kangus's Stuff in Progress

item.title: Flare Pack Discussion
item.author: invalid@example.com (Neuroflare)
item.dc:creator: Neuroflare
item.content:encoded:
Being that the Official name for my weapons pack is the flare pack, I am opening a thread where discussions about it can be had, questions can be answered and what not.

So, first on the agenda is:
I am dissatisfied by alt fire for the scram cannon. Its not as much funas primary, and leaves much to be desired of it. Currently it basically a single, sober rocket that locks onto a foe that gets too close and homes in on them. Not too interesting compared to multiple drunk rockets that whoop...

Flare Pack Discussion

item.title: headshot bonus v120 ut99
item.author: invalid@example.com (hskm)
item.dc:creator: hskm
item.content:encoded:
We have the headshot bonus on our server. Problem is we want to spawn with the sniper rifle and have the hammer in game. When we select to spawn with the sniper rifle the hammer is out of the game. Is there another headshot bonus mod that would allow both?
Thanks,
KM

item.title: doom invasion

item.content:encoded:
HI !

it would be very cool if you could code a doom invasion mod
(invasion against the doom monsters)
the old doom that is

I think it would require minimal coding (for example the cyberdaemon is almost the same as a warlord, but he does not fly, has more power)

there are some doom ports out there that have md2 models (quake 2 model format) for every doom monster
I dont know if you could import them directly to ut2003, but I guess it would work somehow with opening them in...

doom invasion

item.title: Ok, I need help with the SWX
item.author: invalid@example.com (SamMaster)
item.dc:creator: SamMaster
item.content:encoded:
My Super Shock Rifle X will just end up sucking... Can't do what I like with it.

So what do you guys suggest I do instead? I need something that will complement well the other superweapons. Note that I have:

- Retro-Plasma Assault Rifle
- Magma Gun
- Black and White Gun
- Gatling Cannon
- Super Flak Cannon X
- Super Rocket Launcher X
- Retro-Plasma Sniper Rifle

Gimme your thoughts. It needs to be chaotic.

item.title: Objectives via a mutator...
item.author: invalid@example.com (EvilDrWong)
item.dc:creator: EvilDrWong
item.content:encoded:
Ive been pondering a way to add objectives to a game via a mutator. Im not concerned with bot ai right now, because theres always a way to jimmy-rig the game to act the way you want (and AI scares the crap out of me I was considering a dynamic system where instead of the objectives being built into the map, the objectives are actually saved to an ini and read when the map loads. Of course, this means that there has to be a way to create them, thus ive come up with a rather screwed...

Objectives via a mutator...

item.title: Hey, programr art
item.author: invalid@example.com (debucode)
item.dc:creator: debucode
item.content:encoded:
So...I seem to have bought me a copy of 3DSMax and dropped in some of the models I have from Milkshape and did some goofing around. So I've got me a smoothed up ninja and a little bump mapping for his sword. Unfortunately, I got a little ahead of myself in the conversion process and now have to do some re-uv mapping for the ninj. Still feel like I need to fix up the belt/hip region but I'm not sure what to do there, as evidenced by the fact that all my pencil and paper drawings get kind of...

Hey, programr art

item.title: Deaf Death
item.author: invalid@example.com (8mm_BuLLEt)
item.dc:creator: 8mm_BuLLEt
item.content:encoded:
This is a weapon which I though t up just a couple of minutes ago..

Soundwave Cannon

Primary fire : Fires a countinuous shockwave of sound which can deafen whoevers in the range of the cannon (about the radius and maybe a bit bigger than a 'deemer blast) if they stay in the radius long enough.

Secondary fire : The cannon lets off a MASSIVE red wave of sound which inflicts 80 damage. Is not continuous and deafens players in radius instantly. Radius is bigger.

Ammo type : If...

Deaf Death

item.title: Haze
item.author: invalid@example.com (Smoke39)
item.dc:creator: Smoke39
item.content:encoded:
I d'know if this is supposed to go here or GD, so, oh well. :b
Haze is a mutator that lets y' mess with the fog in maps. Got the idea from playing Turok and remembering how thick the fog was. Anyway, asside from making UT feel like an old N64 game, I'm stickin' s'more features in there. Right now you can either use a custom fog color, or have Haze pick a color based on the map's fog. You can also modify the thickness by setting the distance at which the fog starts, and the distance at...

Haze

Its good as it is, but anyone got any ideas how I can make it more unique?

item.title: My total conversion mod
item.author: invalid@example.com (ROFL 451)
item.dc:creator: ROFL 451
item.content:encoded:
Ok, im making a total conversion of UT2004. Think Doom3ish. Im not copying Doom 3 at all (New creatures, storyline, weapons, models, etc) but I wanted the same kinda feel.

Here are the things i need some help with:

Flashlight - The Assault Rifle (My AR is a real monster, spits a lotta lead >:]) has a flashlight strapped to the side. I need to know if i can make a flashlight beam that lights up what you point it at.

Modelling Hands - So far all my models have no hands, but I want...

My total conversion mod

item.title: Hand Grenades
item.author: invalid@example.com (Postal)
item.dc:creator: Postal
item.content:encoded:
Well, what do you think they should be like? Off hand or a stand alone weapon. How long a fuse? How far can be be thrown? Damage?

I got a decient grenade arc, and bouncing off walls, doing heavy damage, etc, but I cant decide between off hand, or making it a weapon. Also, if its a weapon, do you hold the fire button to throw it farther?

What do you guys think?

This link points to a zip file containing a short .avi turntable of it running. It has an abrupt snout that is likened to a nose and will be able to...

Organic Cyborg-Mech

item.title: Kraal Bash!
item.author: invalid@example.com (Dragonfly_of_Forgery)
item.dc:creator: Dragonfly_of_Forgery
item.content:encoded:
When testing my mod, I ended up with a few krall fighting each other, and it looked really cool.

So I though: What if there were a gametype where you just watched two teams of krall kill each other?

Of course, it needs a bit more substance than that. Perhaps it could be an elaborate betting game, where you bet on different teams in an area. Or perhaps thats a stupid idea.

Maybe the player could direct his team of Krall. He could click on one, then click somewhere else to order them...

Kraal Bash!

item.title: Arc Rod - The latest in baking
item.author: invalid@example.com (ROFL 451)
item.dc:creator: ROFL 451
item.content:encoded:
Ok, I am creating a weapon, and i have most of the model done. It is the Arc Rod. Can be configured with the Super Arc Rod for Insta-Gib like games.

Here's the idea:

Hold down primary fire to deliver a stream of supercharged electricity. It wont drain ammo unless you touch someone with it. It delivers constant damage when you are firing and touching someone. No more whack-with-the-shieldgun. Instead, creep up behind that sniper and fry him!

Secondary fire slowly recharges...

Arc Rod - The latest in baking
